title: What is AVN technology in cars? - Quora

response.answer_text: AVN stands for Audio Video Navigation. This term is used by some manufactures for representing the Infotainment system in vehicles. Audio features mainly is entertainment audio, Bluetooth hands free etc. Video is allowed to play under restricted conditions like in park break or less than x speed etc Navigation can be with native navigation or Phone projection modes like Android auto or Apple car play etc

AVN means audio, video and navigation. And as the name suggests AVN is useful for playing audio files all the time, video files under some conditions and video is useful when reverse parking camera is in use. And navigation means the use of maps and alike applications where mobile connection is supported by the infotainment system.
